1.「<pc>さんが お持ちのスキルブックは| <%nc_book>冊のようですね。: Looks like you have <%dc_book> Skill Books.|Can you give them to me?|<yesno><break>

2.「おや……。<pc>さんは スキルブックを| お持ちでないようですね。|<br>:
Hmm... you don't seem to have any Skill Books.|
|Skill Books are scattered all around the|world. If you bring them to me, I will|exchange them for Master Skill Points.

3.「では しばし お待ちください……。: Then, please wait for a while....

4.<se_nots Joutyu_SE 80>|スキルマスターが目を閉じ 祈りを捧: <se_nots Joutyu_SE 80>|When the Skill Master closed his eyes and|prayed, the Skill Book was consumed by|white flames and disappeared into nothing...|<wait=1300>

5.「もう行かれるのですね。| <pc>さんに ダーマの加護が| あらんことを……。: I see you're leaving. May Dharma bless you,|<if_woman>Ms.<else>Mr.<endif> <pc>.

7.「これで <pc>さんの身体に| 新たなる力が宿りました。|<br>|「マスター:
You are now in the possession of a new kind|of power, Ms.Mr. .|
|If you want to use your Master Skill Points,|talk to me and select "Allocate Master|Skills".|
|You can also allocate points at a priest|in any region.

8.マスタースキルポイントが <%sc_point>Ｐ 戻った！: <%sc_point> Master Skill Point(s) have been returned!

9.「スキルブックは 世界各地に散らばっており| そもそも 数える程しか 存在してい:
Skill Books are scattered all around the|world, and are so rare that only a few exist.|
|If you bring me any Skill Books, I will give|you Master Skill Points.

10.「マスタースキルポイントとは| 職業ごとに配分され ポイントの振り直しも| 自由:
Master Skill Points are special skill points|that can be assigned per vocation, and can|be freely reassigned at will.|
|I can reallocate them for you, or you can|also do it at a priest in any region.|
|In addition, each skill line of a vocation|can have its own Master Skill Points assigned.|
|Be aware that even if multiple vocations|have the same skill lines, they still need to|be assigned independently, so be careful.|
|Make sure to not only allocate points in|your current vocations, but other vocations|as well.|
